title: Test Application Data Processing Controls
description: An IT auditor tests a financial application to ensure it correctly calculates sales commissions.

tasks.description: Obtain the commission calculation logic and policy from the business.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the rules for how commissions should be calculated.

tasks.description: Create a test dataset with various sales scenarios (e.g., different products, discount levels).
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive test deck is created.

tasks.description: Run the test data through the application and compare the system's output to a manually calculated result.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the application calculates commissions correctly in all test scenarios.
